info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:06PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mecklenburg, central Gaston and north central York Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gastonia, or over Ranlo, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gastonia, Mt Holly, Belmont, South Gastonia, Dallas, Stanley, Cramerton, Lowell, Ranlo and Mcadenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
